metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43785 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in libX11 due to a boundary condition within the _XkbReadKeySyms() function. This flaw allows a local user to trigger an out-of-bounds read error and read the contents of memory on the system.

criterions.comment: libx11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
